function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Travel restrictions halting the flow of essential staff","Impact":"Disruption to essential services and operations","Mitigation":"Remote work arrangements, rotating shifts, priority travel access","Technologies":"Remote communication tools, teleconferencing, remote access systems","People":"Essential workers, critical infrastructure operators","Owner":"Management, government authorities"},{"Description":"Shortage of personnel for critical infrastructure operations","Impact":"Impaired continuity of essential services and operations","Mitigation":"Priority hiring, cross-training, talent pipeline development","Technologies":"Recruitment platforms, training and development systems","People":"Critical infrastructure operators, decision-makers, crisis management personnel","Owner":"HR departments, management, government authorities"},{"Description":"Obstacles in filling specialized positions due to crisis-induced delays","Impact":"Endangered continuity of essential services and operations","Mitigation":"Streamlined security clearance processes, crisis impact assessments, contingency planning","Technologies":"Digital security clearance systems, crisis management software, contingency planning tools","People":"Critical infrastructure operators, HR departments, crisis management personnel","Owner":"Government authorities, management, HR departments"}]}
